High volume of successful logins using a.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4624 and Zeek conn.log for single user accounts authenticating successfully from multiple, geographically disparate IP addresses within a short time window. Calculate the number of unique IPs per user per time unit (e.g., hour) and flag accounts with high entropy in source IP addresses or sudden spikes using statistical thresholds.
